inclusion.criterion: Primary or secondary osteoarthritis of the hip
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male and non-pregnant female patients aged 18 to 70 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who understand the conditions of the study and are willing to participate for the length of the prescribed follow-up
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous operations in the same hip
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is female of child-bearing age and not taking contraceptive precautions
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone, which may be a contraindication for this study. However, the exact diagnosis and treatment plan are unclear from the provided text.
